avSubtendMIB.name: avSubtendMIB
avSubtendMIB.contactinfo: Ashok Singh Pairgain Technologies Inc 14402 Franklin Avenue Tustin, CA 92780
avSubtendMIB.description: The module defines MIB for Avidia subtending

avSubtendIfTable.name: avSubtendIfTable
avSubtendIfTable.description: A table that contains subtended interface information in Avidia

avSubtendIfEntry.name: avSubtendIfEntry
avSubtendIfEntry.description: Entry in avSubtendIfTable that contains port database information for a subtended interface

avSubtendIndex.name: avSubtendIndex
avSubtendIndex.description: This is the index for the avSubtendIfTable. The index is generated by the agent implementation and is available by querying avSubtendIndexNext

avSubtendIfRowStatus.name: avSubtendIfRowStatus
avSubtendIfRowStatus.description: This specifies the status of a row in the avSubtendIfTable. This allows table entries to be created and deleted.

avSubtendIfIndex.name: avSubtendIfIndex
avSubtendIfIndex.description: This specifies the IfIndex which is computed from Slot number and Port Number for the subtending entry

avSubtendIfVpi.name: avSubtendIfVpi
avSubtendIfVpi.description: This specifies the VPI for the subtending entry

avSubtendIfVci.name: avSubtendIfVci
avSubtendIfVci.description: This specifies the VCI for the subtending entry

avSubtendIfSourceIpAddress.name: avSubtendIfSourceIpAddress
avSubtendIfSourceIpAddress.description: This specifies the source IP address for the subtending entry

avSubtendIfDestinationIpAddress.name: avSubtendIfDestinationIpAddress
avSubtendIfDestinationIpAddress.description: This specifies the destination IP address for the subtending entry

avSubtendIfSubnetMask.name: avSubtendIfSubnetMask
avSubtendIfSubnetMask.description: This specifies the IP subnet mask for the subtending entry

avSubtendIfParentIfIndex.name: avSubtendIfParentIfIndex
avSubtendIfParentIfIndex.description: This specifies the IfIndex for the parent. This is calculated from the slot and port number of the parent

avSubtendIfParentIpAddress.name: avSubtendIfParentIpAddress
avSubtendIfParentIpAddress.description: This specifies the parent IP address for the subtending entry

avSubtendIfAdminStatus.name: avSubtendIfAdminStatus
avSubtendIfAdminStatus.description: The desired state of the interface. The testing(3) state indicates that no operational packets can be passed. When a managed system initializes, all interfaces start with ifAdminStatus in the down(2) state. As a result of either explicit management action or per configuration information retained by the managed system, ifAdminStatus is then changed to either the up(1) or testing(3) states (or remains in the down(2) state).

avSubtendIfOperStatus.name: avSubtendIfOperStatus
avSubtendIfOperStatus.description: The current operational state of the interface. The testing(3) state indicates that no operational packets can be passed. If ifAdminStatus is down(2) then ifOperStatus should be down(2). If ifAdminStatus is changed to up(1) then ifOperStatus should change to up(1) if the interface is ready to transmit and receive network traffic; it should change to dormant(5) if the interface is waiting for external actions (such as a serial line waiting for an incomming connection); it should remain in the down(2) state if and only if there is a fault that prevents if from going to the up(1) state.

avSubtendIndexNext.name: avSubtendIndexNext
avSubtendIndexNext.description: This object contains an appropriate value to be used for avSubtendIndex when creating entries in the avSubtendIfTable. The value 0 indicates that no unassigned entries are available. To obtain the avSubtendIndex value for a new entry, the manager issues a management protocol retrieval operation to obtain the current value of this object.
